setConfig.description: The message allows to set platform parameters

setParameters.description: The message allows to change parameters values to enable/disable specific features

stopProgram.description: The message allows to stop the program

pauseProgram.description: The message allows to pause the program

resumeProgram.description: The message allows to exit from pause mode returning to the cycle previously in execution

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_CHECKUP.description: Short diagnostic cycle (5-25 minutes) to check the correct functioning of the main components of the appliance. **To be started with an empty drum**. At the end you will receive a notification with the results of the Check-Up on your smartphone.

PROGRAMS.TD.WHITES.description: The perfect cycle to dry your resistant fabrics (cotton, linen) - Ex. Towels, bathrobes, tableclothes and sheets.

PROGRAMS.TD.ECO.description: A drying program with high energy efficiency, ideal for cotton fabrics.

PROGRAMS.TD.WOOLMARK.description: The program can be used to dry up to 1 kg of woolen laundry (around 3 jumpers). Reverse all clothes before drying. Timing can change due to dimensions and thickness of load and the spinning chosen during washing. Attention: wool's felting process is irreversible; please dry exclusively clothes with the symbol "ok tumble"; this program is not recommended for acrylic clothes.

PROGRAMS.TD.WATERPROOF_REVITALIZE.description: A special program to revitalize the waterproofing treatment of the linens.

PROGRAMS.TD.SYNTHETICS.description: A low/medium temperature drying program for synthetic fabrics. This program minimizes the creasing of the clothing and takes care of your laundry.

PROGRAMS.TD.SHIRTS.description: The ideal cycle to dry cotton and synthetic shirts, enhancing and providing the best care of fibers.

PROGRAMS.TD.JEANS.description: A special program to dry your jeans, ensuring an anticrease function and the immediate use of your denim.

PROGRAMS.TD.FITNESS.description: The Fitness program takes care of your technical garments used for sports and fitness activities: the machine dries gently with special care to avoid the shrinking and deterioration of elastic fibres.

PROGRAMS.TD.SOFT_CARE.description: With the Soft Care program and a small load, the machine will take care of your most delicate garments.

PROGRAMS.TD.FRESH_CARE.description: Thanks to the Fresh Care cycle, the machine can take care of your different fabrics together (cottons and synthetics), drying them in just 59'. If the load is less than the recommended one or with a low level of residual humidity, the cycle is shortened to avoid over-drying the garments.

PROGRAMS.TD.ALLERGY_CARE.description: One specific cycle that dries and, at the same time, helps to reduce the main allergens such as dust mites, pet hair, pollens and powder detergent residues.

PROGRAMS.TD.CARE_59.description: This drying cycle allows you to have your clothes ready in just 59 minutes.

PROGRAMS.TD.CARE_45.description: This drying cycle allows you to have your clothes ready in just 45 minutes.

PROGRAMS.TD.CARE_30.description: This drying cycle allows you to have your clothes ready in just 30 minutes.

PROGRAMS.TD.ALL_IN_ONE.description: A cycle to dry different kinds of fabrics all together. The dryer provides an alert when the lightweight fabrics are dry and ready to be taken out. After this step, it's necessary to press start again to complete the drying for the remaining heavier linens.

PROGRAMS.TD.AUTO_CARE.description: The Auto Care cycle is the exclusive program that can automatically adapt its drying technology to the capacity and type of clothes.

PROGRAMS.TD.ACTIVE_DRY.description: Active Dry is the perfect cycle to use if you want to smooth creases and remove bad smells from your linen.

PROGRAMS.TD.XXL_LOAD.description: Specific cycle dedicated to dry huge linens size like curtains, sheets and tableclothes.

PROGRAMS.TD.RELAX_CREASES.description: The perfect cycle to remove the bad smells from the linens smoothing creases.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_COTTON.description: A program designed to dry cotton clothes, supporting the relaxing of creases and facilitating ironing.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_SYNTHETICS.description: Low temperature drying program recommended for mixed (synthetic/cotton) and synthetic fibres. Aalways refer to the laundry care label.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_MIXED.description: This special cycle allows to reduce drying time by a third for loads with mixed and synthetic fabrics, maintaining a high level of class A energy efficiency

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_DELICATES.description: A special cycle for drying delicate clothes that require a specific treatment.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_WOOL.description: Low temperature drying program, ideal to dry wool clothes with maximum care and softness. .

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_RAPID_30.description: 30-minute quick cycle, ideal when you want to quickly dry small loads.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_RAPID_59.description: Rapid program for medium loads that ensure the best drying. It's recommended to spin at high speed before drying.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_BED_QUILT.description: Perfect cycle to dry uniformly duvets and quilts, revitalizing the smoothness of the feathers

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_ANTI_MITES.description: The best cycle to dry cotton clothes, removing dust mites thanks to high temperatures.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_BACKPACKS.description: Customisable time programme, ideal for drying backpacks and pouches. Thanks to delicate temperatures and special movements of the basket, itguarantees the full regeneration of the fabrics.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_BED_LINEN.description: The perfect cycle to dry your cotton or synthetic sheets, ensuring the best reduction of creases.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_CURTAINS.description: The best cycle to dry curtains, while providing maximum care to delicate fabrics and the reduction of creases.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_DELICATE_TABLECLOTHS.description: The ideal program to dry tableclothes accurately, while protecting very delicate fabrics.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_DUVET.description: The ideal cycle to dry a single duvet or quilted jackets.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_TABLECLOTHS.description: Customisable automatic programme, designed for drying table cloths, even the most resistant, in the best way. It keeps crease formation to a minimum thanks to specific movements of the basket.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_DOWN_JACKET.description: A specific cycle to dry your jackets, while preserving their fibres.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_BABY.description: Specific program for the cotton clothes of the babies, which guarantees a much better hygiene level than the open air drying.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_BATHROBE.description: The ideal cycle to dry spongy fabrics, enhancing softness and preventing bad odors.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_CUDDLY_TOYS.description: Customisable automatic programme, dedicated to drying plushies. Thanks to the specific movements of the basket and the delicate temperatures, it guarantees they are not damaged and stay soft.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_DEHUMIDIFIER.description: A rapid program to remove moisture from the clothes.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_DENIM_JEANS.description: A special program to dry your jeans, ensuring an anticrease function and the immediate use of your denim.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_EASY_IRON_COTTON.description: A program designed to dry cotton clothes, supporting the relaxing of creases and facilitating ironing.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_EASY_IRON_SYNTHETICS.description: The perfect cycle to dry your synthetic and mixed clothes, ensuring an anticrease action and facilitating the ironing.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_GYM_FIT.description: The ideal program to dry gym clothes, suitable for synthetic and cotton fibers.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_LINGERIE.description: Customisable automatic programme designed for drying lingerie; it uses specific basket movements, guaranteeing utmost care even for delicate fabrics.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_PLAYSUITS.description: The best cycle to dry synthetic and cotton play suits, preserving elasticity and softness.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_REGENERATES_WATERPRO.description: A cycle designed to regenerate waterproof fabrics after a long use under rain.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_SHIRTS.description: The ideal cycle to dry cotton and synthetic shirts, enhancing the best care of fibers .

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_SWIMSUITS_AND_BIKINI.description: Default time programme dedicated to bathing costumes. Thanks to delicate temperatures and specific movements of the basket, the elasticity and quality of the synthetic fibres is preserved.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_TECHNICAL_FABRICS.description: Automatic programme, customisable at low temperatures, designed for drying technical fabrics without affecting their elasticity.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_WARM_EMBRACE.description: Rapid program to dry even your delicate clothes, providing them a warm feeling of softness.

PROGRAMS.TD.IOT_DRY_SMALL_LOAD.description: Dedicated to get an even drying for extremely small loads without the overdry risking.
